name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_59fea486-6477-4d68-aec0-c96c789d70b2
text:
rule Account_Added_in_Sensitive_Privileged_Security_Groups {
  

  meta:
    

    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Account_Added_in_Sensitive_Privileged_Security_Groups"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Privilege escalation"
    mitre_attack_technique = "valid accounts"


  events:

    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "4727" or $e.metadata.product_event_type="4728" or $e.metadata.product_event_type="4729" or $e.metadata.product_event_type="4730"

  outcome:

    $risk_score = 50

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
